mixin animation public

Animates an element.

 Defined in:

base/utilities/_mixins.scss:73

 scss 
@include fade-in(); // include the 'fade-in' keyframes animation mixin

.bozo {
   @include animation('fade-in' .3s ease-out);
}

base

variable linear-channel-values private

This lookup table is needed since there is no pow in SASS. Pre-computed linear color channel values, for use in contrast calculations. See https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20-TECHS/G17.html#G17-tests

 Defined in:

base/_linear-channel-values.scss:23

Example

Algorithm, for c in 0 to 255:

 javascript 
f(c) {
  c = c / 255;
  return c < 0.03928 ? c / 12.92 : Math.pow((c + 0.055) / 1.055, 2.4);
}

Authors

  • Google Inc.

function bem-selector public

Generates a full BEM selector.

 Defined in:

base/utilities/_bem.scss:135

Example

Include a block

 scss 
@include bem-selector(block); // outputs .block

Example

Include a block and an element

 scss 
@include bem-selector(block, $e:elem); // outputs .block__elem

Example

Include block, element, and element modifier

 scss 
@include bem-selector(block, $e:(elem,emod); // outputs .block__elem-emod

Example

Include block and block modifier

 scss 
@include bem-selector(block, $m:mod) // outputs .block--mod

Example

Include block and modifier value

 scss 
@include bem-selector(block, $m:(mod:val)); // outputs .block--mod-val

Example

Include block modifier followed by block sub-element

 scss 
@include bem-selector(block, $m:mod, $e:elem); // outputs .block--mod .block__elem

Parameters

Name
Description
Type
Default Value
$block

Required. A string block name.

String
none
$elem

Optional. A sub-element name. If $mod is not present, it is joined with $block. If $mod is present, it is nested under $block--$mod.

String|List
none
$mod

Optional. A block modifier.

String|Map
none

Authors

  • Juan Patten

  • Simeon Simeonoff

mixin bem-block public

Authors

  • Juan Patten

  • Simeon Simeonoff

mixin bem-elem public

Unrolls into a proper BEM element selector, depending on the context. Inside just a block, yields a root-level .block__elem. Inside a mod or pseudo-selector, yields a nested .block--mod .block__elem. If $mod is included, it is appended to the block selector. Multiple $mods are not supported.

 Defined in:

base/utilities/_bem.scss:198

Parameters

Name
Description
Type
Default Value
$elem

The sub-element name.

String
none
$m

The modifier name.

String
none
$mod

An alias of $m.

String

mixin igx-type-style public

Assigns type scale category config properties as style rules wherever this mixin is included.

 Defined in:

typography/_base.scss:201

Example

Add the h1 styles to custom CSS selector.

 scss 
.fancy-h1 {
   @include igx-type-style($default-type-scale, 'h1');
   font-family: 'GT Walsheim';
   color: mediumvioletred;
}

Parameters

Name
Description
Type
Default Value
$scale

A type scale map reference as produces by igx-type-scale.

Map
none
$category

The type scale category config you want to use as CSS style rules.

String
none

mixin igx-typography public

Adds typography styles for h1-h6, paragraph and creates custom typography class selectors. The produces styles are based on the passed type scale. If omitted the default-type-scale will be used.

 Defined in:

typography/_typography.scss:29

Parameters

Name
Description
Type
Default Value

The font family to be used across all typographic elements.

String
"'Titillium Web', sans-serif"
$type-scale

A type scale map as produced by igx-type-scale.

Map
$default-type-scale
$base-color

The default color used across all typographic elements (Components define their own text colors).

String
rgba(0, 0, 0, .74)

function igx-type-scale public

Creates a type scale map containing type style definitions for:

  • h1
  • h2
  • h3
  • h4
  • h5
  • h6
  • subtitle-1
  • subtitle-2
  • body-1
  • body-2
  • button
  • caption
  • overline

 Defined in:

typography/_base.scss:34

function --var public

Returns a CSS property value. It could return either css '--var' or a plain string value based on theme configuration.

 Defined in:

base/utilities/_functions.scss:352

Example

Assign the color property in a rule-set to a value from the default avatar theme.

 scss 
%igx-avatar-icon {
  color: --var($avatar-theme, 'icon-color');
}
// If legacy-support is off, it will produce the following:
// %igx-avatar-icon {
//   color: var(--igx-avatar-icon-color);
// }
// otherwise, it will return the value for key 'icon-color' in the '$avatar-theme';

Parameters

Name
Description
Type
Default Value

$key

mixin gen-color-classes private

Generates CSS class names for all colors from the color palette for a given property, with optional prefix and suffix attached to the class name.

 Defined in:

base/utilities/_mixins.scss:120

Example

Generate background classes with colors from the palette.

 scss 
// Will generate class names like
// .my-primary-500-bg { ... };
@include gen-color-classes(
  $prop: 'background-color',
  $prefix: 'my', $suffix: 'bg'
);

mixin igx-scope private

Scopes CSS rules to a predefined top-level parent selector. Respects specificity and selector scopes.

 Defined in:

base/utilities/_mixins.scss:249

Example

Apply mixin style rules only when '.igx-typography' selector is present.

 scss 
@mixin igx-card-typography {
   @include igx-scope('.igx-typography') {
     // style rules...
   }
}

// Later
.my-selector {
  @include igx-card-typography();
}

// Generated CSS
// .igx-typography .my-selector {
//    ...styles rules as output by igx-card-typography mixin
// }

Parameters

Name
Description
Type
Default Value
$parent

The selector to be used as top level scope.

String
none

Authors

  • Simeon Simeonoff
